alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:16PM CST until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Little Mound Creek Near Mathis Road affecting Harris County. For the Cypress Creek...including Eldridge Parkway, Mathis Road, Sharp Road, Katy-Hockley Road, Hufmeister Road, Grant Road, Kohrville, Stuebner-Airline Road, Westfield, Kuykendahl Road, Inverness Forest, Cypresswood Drive...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Mound Creek near Mathis Road. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:05 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 205.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 202.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:05 PM CST Wednesday was 205.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 206.3 feet just after midnight tonight. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 205.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 207.9 feet on 07/12/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 430 PM CST.
